summary: A large Temple suitable for live in wilderness. No load door, fully equipped.
descriptionHtml:
An old temple ruined and is now occupied by bandits, you can have the temple after a real fight.

All rooms located outdoor, at a mountain top, with fantastic view. All things needed for a home are prepared, even comes with a blacksmith and a chef. 



UPDATE:
v1.1 Lower Wing Expended with Trainers 
+ 3 Master Level Trainers.
+ all 9 shrines in lower wing.
+ 10 weapon racks in lower wing.
+ improved path connecting lower and upper wing of the temple.
+++ backup your save before update for safe. +++
+ please let me know if you have any ideas.





Q: What this mod gives to you:
A: A home at mountain top in sky heaven temple style.
+Full working blacksmith part.
+An enchanting table.
+A Alchemy table.
+12 Mannequins.
+3 larger bookshelves.
+5 safe chests and strongbox.
+20+ weapon racks and a large display room.
+Guard towers and walkways for your loyal companions to stay.
+10+ beds for your companions.
+Absolute fascinating scenes at all 360 degrees.
+A Prefect and Unique home for companions collector!




Q: Where to find it?
A: a mountain top located east of Whiterun, see picture for reference.




Q: How to get in?
A: As the temple is now occupied by bandits, you will have to kill one of them and take the key on it.




Q: How can I access those chests and strongbox?
A: Master Key can be found on the bandit boss, which in imperial heavy armor.




Q: Which Chest are safe to store my stuff?
A: All chests and strongbox require the master key to access are safe. All bookshelves are safe.




Q: What does the chef are there for?
A: The chef have NO function but a decoration. However, the blacksmith lives there can trade with you.




A: How to install?
Q: Just use the NMM, or do it by you hand.



KNOW ISSUES
Q: Those mannequins walks!!
A: You will have to download mannequins fix mod. Thats a game bug, not mine.

Q: Those mannequins changed their location after I reload the game!!
A: I don\'t know why, but they will standing on same location FOREVER once you give them something to wear, like a ring or a clothe. You can find \"Active mannequins\" command on the supposed location even they are not standing there.

Q: Your English is not quite readable!!
A: I am sorry for that!

Q: Any other Bugs?
A: I tested many times to make it work like this, but if any bugs found, please let me know.
author: halordy

files.name: SkyTempleBlossom Lower Wing Expended with Trainers
